name: infrequency
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of not happening very often: We had to stay overnight here because of the infrequency of buses and trains to Montreal. I was surprised that the inspectors came to visit the restaurant with such infrequency.
More examplesFewer examplesThe excitement created by these occasions makes up for their infrequency.He buys his mother expensive gifts to atone for the infrequency of his visits.Storms of this size have been recorded in the area before, but only with great infrequency.
